votebox.middle.datacollection

Class Launcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • votebox.middle.datacollection.Launcher

  • public class Launcher
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a launcher for the vote system. Use this launcher in order to do human factors type testing.

    • Field Summary

      This is the gui for this launcher.

    • Method Detail

      • launch

        public void launch(java.lang.String ballotLocation,
          java.lang.String logDir,
          java.lang.String logFilename,
          boolean debug,
          java.lang.String vvpat,
          int vvpatWidth,
          int vvpatHeight,
          int printableWidth,
          int printableHeight)
        Launch the votebox software after doing some brief sanity checking. These checks won't catch everything but they will catch enough problems caused by simple accidents.
        Parameters:
        ballotLocation - This is the location of the ballot. (zip)
        logDir - This is the directory that log files should be written out to. (dir)
        logFilename - This is the desired filename for the log file.
        debug - Passed to AWTViewFactory to determine windowed/full screen mode.
